sn34.53-54:4.3: samādhismiṃ sātaccakārī hoti, na samādhismiṃ sakkaccakārī …
sn34.53-54:4.4: neva samādhismiṃ sakkaccakārī hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ sātaccakārī …

sn34.53-54:6.1: “Samādhismiṃ sakkaccakārī hoti, na samādhismiṃ sappāyakārī … pe ….
